channel.title: Wellantscape v4.1 [fixed] (317) 200+ downloads! +delete the lava! tut!
channel.description:
{sorry for my bad english} (i am dutch) the first wellantscape v4.1 whas very bad i know it so i started edditing and this are the resolds pics: http://wellantscape.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=8892061
{((commands))} Player commands ::switch ::starter ::home ::fly ::Jump ::jumpoff ::wc ::yell ::food ::dance ::smith ::skills ::rep ::kbd ::mini ::dbmini ::afk ::back ::gsmini ::suggest Many more just do ::commands ~~~~~~ Mod commands ::kick ::notedbarrows ::az ::1hit ::mute ::unmute ::pring ::spec ::money ::sweet ::modwear ::pure ::god ::alert ::mypk ::alert ::staffeiland 100% made by me ::staffhangout 100% made by me many more just do ::commands ~~~~~~~ Admin commands ::banuser ::unban ::pnpc ::pickup ::npc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::k0 ::money ::god ::adminwear many more just do ::commands ~~~~~~~~ Owner commands ::ownerwear ::ipban ::staffmeeting ::void ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner ::eat ::update ::demote many more just do ::commands
what is done: 1. walls tree's and water is now lava {very lol!} ;D :D :D 2. fixed npc id list in client. 3. more colours in client. 4. maked ::runes for everyone. (for the noobs) :P :P 5. fixed bugs. 6. added 1 more shop. 7. added pest control and castle wars. ;D ;D 8. made lava house at ::lava. 9. made more tele commands like ::lumbridge (almost al city's of rs world). 10. added more zone's jus like a piece of 7. 11. added more npc's by ::kq first only one but now more. 12. changed background, chatbox an all orther stuff. alot more but i forgot it.....
Custom Item Id List! 9117 Black Mask 9118 Yellow Mask 9106 Null 10103 red Whip 10106 Gold whip 10105 Barrows Whip 10100 Orange whip 10101 Purple whip 10102 Unknown color whip 9091 NUll 10110 Gold Phat 10111 Grey Phat 10109 Orange phat 10117 Dragon Phat 10118 barrows phat 10116 rune Phat 10115 Addy phat 10114 Mith Phat 10113 Steel phat 10112 iron phat 10091 Black Santa Hat 10090 Purple Santa hat 10096 Gold santa hat 10094 Dragon Santa hat 10098 Blue santa hat 10097 barrows santa hat 10093 rune santa hat 10095 addy santa hat 10092 mith santa 1283 DILDO _----------------_ 15150 Summoning Skillcape 16600 Dragon platebody 15114 Ivandis Chainmail 15112 Ivandis Platelegs 15116 Ivandis Sheild 15111 Ivandis helm 15115 Ivandis boots 15113 Ivandis gauntlets 15117 Ivandis blade 15338 lava Chainmail 15339 lava Platelegs 15340 lava sheild 15343 lava helm 15341 lava boots 15342 lava gauntlets 15337 lava blade 8002 Dragon Claws 15603 Beautiful cape 15602 dragon cape 13665 Tri god warspear 13943 energy blades 14396 dragon pickaxe 11115 hidan's scythe 10011 Dragon kite shield (wing shield) 9999 dragon kite shield 10007 Dragon platebody 13459 blue lightsaber 13643 Statius warhammer
creds: source: 25% stabbingscape {base} 25% moparscape tut's 50% me for editting client: 25% stabbingscape {base} 10% google for pics for the background's enz. 15% my friends for testing and playing it, thank bro's 50% me for editting source link: http://www.mediafire.com/?nzybdzmxuzn client link: http://www.mediafire.com/?ncyjtzjydkt thanks for the 200+ downloads please leave a message to keep this post alive how to delete the lava: Open Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3 and search for : public static final int[] method371(int i) under the : { delete if (i == 1) { i = 40; } if (i == 2) { i = 40; } if (i == 3) { i = 40; } if (i == 4) { i = 40; } if (i == 5) { i = 40; } if (i == 6) { i = 40; } if (i == 7) { i = 40; } if (i == 8) { i = 40; } if (i == 9) { i = 40; } if (i == 10) { i = 40; } if (i == 11) { i = 40; } if (i == 12) { i = 40; } if (i == 13) { i = 40; } if (i == 14) { i = 40; } if (i == 15) { i = 40; } if (i == 16) { i = 40; } if (i == 17) { i = 40; } if (i == 18) { i = 40; } if (i == 19) { i = 40; } if (i == 20) { i = 40; } if (i == 21) { i = 40; } if (i == 22) { i = 40; } if (i == 23) { i = 40; } if (i == 24) { i = 40; } if (i == 25) { i = 40; } if (i == 26) { i = 40; } if (i == 27) { i = 40; } if (i == 28) { i = 40; } if (i == 29) { i = 40; } if (i == 30) { i = 40; } if (i == 31) { i = 40; } if (i == 32) { i = 40; } if (i == 33) { i = 40; } if (i == 34) { i = 40; } if (i == 35) { i = 40; } if (i == 36) { i = 40; } if (i == 37) { i = 40; } if (i == 38) { i = 40; } if (i == 39) { i = 40; } if (i == 40) { i = 40; } if (i == 41) { i = 40; } if (i == 42) { i = 40; } if (i == 43) { i = 40; } if (i == 44) { i = 40; } if (i == 45) { i = 40; } if (i == 46) { i = 40; } if (i == 47) { i = 40; } if (i == 48) { i = 40; } if (i == 49) { i = 40; } if (i == 50) { i = 40; }

@brian9612 wrote:

{sorry for my bad english} (i am dutch)
the first wellantscape v4.1 whas very bad i know it so i started edditing and this are the resolds

pics: http://wellantscape.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=8892061

{((commands))}

Player commands

::switch

::starter

::home

::fly

::Jump

::jumpoff

::wc

::yell

::food

::dance

::smith

::skills

::rep

::kbd

::mini

::dbmini

::afk

::back

::gsmini

::suggest

Many more just do ::commands


Mod commands

 

::kick

::notedbarrows

::az

::1hit

::mute

::unmute 

::pring

::spec

::money

::sweet

::modwear

::pure

::god

::alert

::mypk

::alert

::staffeiland 100% made by me

::staffhangout 100% made by me

Admin commands

::banuser

::unban

::pnpc

::pickup

::npc

::xteleto

::xteletome

::k0

::money

::god

::adminwear

many more just do ::commands


Owner commands

 

::ownerwear

::ipban

::staffmeeting

::void

::giveadmin

::givemod

::giveowner

::eat

::update

::demote

many more just do ::commands</blockquote>
what is done:
1.  walls tree's and water is now lava {very lol!}  ;D :D :D
2.  fixed npc id list in client.
3.  more colours in client.
4.  maked ::runes for everyone. (for the noobs)  :P :P
5.  fixed bugs.
6.  added 1 more shop.
7.  added pest control and castle wars.  ;D ;D
8.  made lava house at ::lava.
9.  made more tele commands like ::lumbridge  (almost al city's of rs world).
10. added more zone's jus like a piece of 7.
11. added more npc's by ::kq first only one but now more.
12. changed background, chatbox an all orther stuff.
alot more but i forgot it.....
